The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 August is 293,066 (33,777.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 July, there were 930 new confirmed cases (107.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 July, there were 1,504 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 38% (574 fewer cases).
